Method.Doc: Gets the list of roles of a given person in a given company.

XFrom.XTable: fw_person p INNER JOIN fw_person_company pc ON (pc.id_person = p.id) INNER JOIN fw_person_rel_group prg ON (prg.id_person = p.id) INNER JOIN fw_person_group pg ON (pg.id = prg.id_person_group) INNER JOIN fw_allocation a ON (a.id_person_group = pg.id) INNER JOIN fw_role r ON (r.id = a.id_role AND r.id_company = pc.id_company)
